import React, { Fragment } from "react"; import { Button, Card, Col, Image, ListGroup, Row } from "react-bootstrap"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import Rating from "../components/Rating"; import products from "../products"; const ProductScreen = ({ match }) => { const product = products.find((i) => i._id === match.params.id); console.log(product); return ( GO BACK

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Description: {product.description} Price: {product.price} Status: {product.stockInCount > 0 ? "In Stock" : "Out of Stock"} ); }; export default ProductScreen;
